long_description: SkinFare Topical Nourishment balm sinks deep into your skin to protect and repair. It helps prevent chafing on long runs and helps heal scrapes and bruises after a full day of rock climbing. Palmarosa, rosemary and helichrysum essential oils combine to soothe and repair your skin. Use before a long run to prevent chafing or after climbing to heal scrapes and bruises; stash the balm in a diaper bag to soothe your toddler's boo-boos and irritations. SkinFare Topical Nourishment balm is USDA certified organic. Packaging is biodegradable.
short_description: SkinFare Topical Nourishment balm sinks deep into your skin to protect and repair. It helps prevent chafing on long runs and helps heal scrapes and bruises after a full day of rock climbing.
